description:
I've tried to use VDswitch with nova. But it don't seem to be worked. Here is traceback:
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3] Traceback (most recent call last):
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1091, in _spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     block_device_info)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/driver.py", line 177, in spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     block_device_info)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py", line 198, in spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     vif_infos = _get_vif_infos()
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py", line 188, in _get_vif_infos
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     self._cluster)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vif.py", line 58, in ensure_vlan_bridge
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     adapter=vlan_interface)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3] SwitchNotFoundForNetworkAdapter: Virtual switch associated with the network adapter vmnic0 not found.
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]
title: Can't use vmware distributed virtual switch with nova

comments.content:
I've tried to use VDswitch with nova. But it don't seem to be worked. Here is traceback:
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3] Traceback (most recent call last):
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 1091, in _spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     block_device_info)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/driver.py", line 177, in spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     block_device_info)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py", line 198, in spawn
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     vif_infos = _get_vif_infos()
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py", line 188, in _get_vif_infos
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     self._cluster)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vif.py", line 58, in ensure_vlan_bridge
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]     adapter=vlan_interface)
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3] SwitchNotFoundForNetworkAdapter: Virtual switch associated with the network adapter vmnic0 not found.
2013-06-12 16:57:18.075 15195 TRACE nova.compute.manager [instance: 5b6967d0-9404-4de2-b5d5-ecbdbcf65cc3]

comments.content: There's a review that is not showing up here - https://review.openstack.org/#/c/43641/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/43641
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/3a5e4fae1306b6114162a1663c8837219893d8c2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 3a5e4fae1306b6114162a1663c8837219893d8c2
Author: Davanum Srinivas <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Aug 25 22:40:30 2013 -0400

    VMware: Fix ensure_vlan_bridge to work properly with existing DVS
    
    With Nova Flat Network, if the DVS exists, we should not try to
    worry about virtual switches or port groups. We should just return
    the network_ref
    
    ensure_vlan_bridge was also missing the return of network_ref at
    tne end of the method, added that as well since that return value
    is needed/used in virt/vmwareapi/vmops.py#L191
    
    Fixes LP# 1194018
    
    Change-Id: I78c71e4c15f1aa87378ae2eb0448c047c6a2a666
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
